Pattern Library

Overview

Status

A collection of statuses to indicate which stage a style, element or pattern is currently in.
IN DEVELOPMENT

Do not implement. This component may be experimental and un-tested. Expect significant change before this item put to use.

TESTING

Do not implement. This component may be experimental and un-tested. Expect significant change before this item put to use.

READY

Do not implement. This component may be experimental and un-tested. Expect significant change before this item put to use.

NOT IN USE

Do not implement. This component may be experimental and un-tested. Expect significant change before this item put to use.
